Package net.antidot.api.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectorInterface
    Antidot search engine connector interface.
    FacetValueHelperInterface
    Interface representing one facet value.
    FeedCoderInterface
    Interface for coder of feed values.
    FilterCoderInterface
    Interface for coder of filters and filter values.
    TextFormatter
    Interface to format output text at your convenience.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicTextFormatter
    Basic string formatter.
    CoderBase
    Base class for coder.
    CoderManager
    Entry point for feed and filter coders.
    Connector
    Antidot search engine connector.
    DefaultFeedCoder
    Default implementation for feed coder.
    DefaultFilterCoder
    Default implementation for filter coder.
    Facet
    Facet configuration.
    FacetHelper
    Helper to access main facet data from Antidot search engine reply.
    FacetRegistry
    Register for all configured facets.
    FacetValueBuilder
    Simplify the build of facet values.
    IntervalFacetValueHelper
    Represents one value of interval facet.
    MetaHelper
    Helper to access main meta data from Antidot search engine reply.
    PagerHelper
    Helper to access pager information for a given reply set.
    ProtobufExtensionManager
    Simple manager which registers necessary Google extensions.
    Query
    Immutable query object.
    QueryCoder
    Encodes/decodes queries.
    QueryManager
    Manages query.
    RepliesHelper
    Main helper to manager Antidot search engine replies.
    ReplyHelper
    Helper for one reply.
    ReplySetHelper
    Helper to access replies from one feed.
    TreeFacetValueHelper
    Represent one value of a facet.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FacetCombination
    Combination of the values of the facet.
    FacetMode
    Management of new facet value.
    FacetStickyness
    Sticky characteristic of facets.
    FacetType
    Type of the facet.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncompleteReplySetException
    Invalid reply is provided by Antidot search engine.
    ReplyException
    Base class for internal runtime exception.
